data.name: Batman: Arkham Origins - New Millennium Skins Pack
data.detailed_description:
Customize Batman™ and Robin with these exclusive skins! Included are:

  • Red Son Batman™
  • Blackest Night Batman™
  • New 52 Graphic Batman™
  • Batman™: Noel
  • 1st Appearance Batman™
  • One Year Later Robin

The Batman™ Skins can be used in the story campaign upon completion of the main story, in the challenge maps, and online. The Robin Skin can only be used online.

data.short_description: Customize Batman™ and Robin with these exclusive skins! Included are: Red Son Batman™Blackest Night Batman™New 52 Graphic Batman™Batman™: Noel 1st Appearance Batman™One Year Later RobinThe Batman™ Skins can be used in the story campaign upon completion of the main story, in the challenge maps, and online.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 32-bit: Vista, Win 7, Win 8
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo, 2.4 GHz / AMD Athlon X2, 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GTS / AMD Radeon HD 3850
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit: Vista, Win 7, Win 8
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-750, 2.67 GHz / AMD Phenom II X4 965, 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 / AMD Radeon HD 6950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
